intro: Stellaris, commonly known as the starflower, is a flowering plant native to the eastern United States. It belongs to the genus *Oenothera* in the family Onagraceae. The plant is characterized by its showy, star-shaped yellow or orange flowers that bloom in late summer. Its leaves are opposite, lance-shaped, and covered in fine hairs. Stellaris is often found in moist soils along stream banks and in woodland areas.
